articles.author: yyctrader
articles.description: Terra’s stablecoin UST, the poster child for decentralized assets tied to the US dollar, is off its peg by the most ever as its backbone, the LUNA token, dives.
articles.title: Terra’s UST De-Pegs by 40%, Raising Questions About Feasibility of Algorithmic Stablecoins The algorithmic stablecoin dropped below its $1 peg as the LUNA token plunged.
